name: json-schema-to-zod-piped
description: A wrapper around json-schema-to-zod for using stdin / stdout
author: Fabian <spiele2014fs@gmail.com>

scripts.show-help: tsc && minify src/main.js > src/main.min.js && cp src/main.min.js src/main.js && node src/main.js --help
scripts.build: tsc && minify src/main.js > src/main.min.js && cp src/main.min.js src/main.js
